name: Future Educators Foundation
mission: Empowering rural communities through quality education and skill development programs.
description: Future Educators Foundation works across Uttar Pradesh and Madhya Pradesh, providing educational resources and teacher training to over 50 schools. We focus on making quality education accessible to underprivileged children.

projects.title: Village Teacher Training Initiative
projects.description: Trained 500+ teachers in modern teaching methodologies

name: Health for All Initiative
mission: Ensuring access to quality healthcare in underserved communities across India.
description: Health for All Initiative operates mobile clinics and trains community health workers in rural Maharashtra and Gujarat. We focus on preventive care and health education.

name: Green Earth Collective
mission: Promoting sustainable livelihoods through environmental conservation.
description: Green Earth Collective works on reforestation, organic farming, and sustainable tourism in Western Ghats. We engage local communities in conservation efforts.

name: Tech Skills Academy
mission: Building tech talent from underrepresented communities through bootcamp and mentorship.
description: Tech Skills Academy runs intensive coding bootcamps and provides job placement support. We have trained 2000+ developers from low-income backgrounds.

name: ACIC Innovation Hub
mission: Accelerating social enterprises solving India's critical challenges through innovation.
description: ACIC Innovation Hub supports 50+ social enterprises annually through mentorship, funding, and network access. We focus on scalable solutions for governance, education, and livelihood.

projects.title: Accelerator Program
projects.description: Supporting 50+ social enterprises with $2M in funding

projects.title: Innovation Fellowship
projects.description: 100+ fellows trained in social enterprise management

name: Vocational Skills India
mission: Providing vocational training to youth for employment and entrepreneurship.
description: Vocational Skills India runs training centers in rural Andhra Pradesh, offering courses in construction, hospitality, and healthcare. We have trained 10000+ youth.

name: Women Empowerment Network
mission: Empowering rural women through self-help groups and economic opportunities.
description: WEN facilitates self-help groups across Rajasthan, providing microfinance, business training, and market linkages. We support 5000+ women entrepreneurs.

projects.title: Women Entrepreneur Bootcamp
projects.description: Trained 1000+ women in business and financial literacy

name: Youth Leadership Foundation
mission: Developing next-generation leaders through civic engagement and skills training.
description: YLF runs leadership programs in schools, colleges, and communities across Tamil Nadu. We focus on youth civic engagement and social responsibility.

projects.title: School Leadership Program
projects.description: Engaging 10000+ school students in civic activities

projects.title: College Fellowship
projects.description: 50+ college leaders selected as change agents

name: Clean Water Foundation
mission: Ensuring access to safe drinking water and sanitation in rural communities.
description: Clean Water Foundation builds and maintains water systems in rural Bihar, benefiting 50000+ people. We also provide hygiene education and community training.

name: Digital Innovation Lab
mission: Enabling digital solutions for social good through innovation and collaboration.
description: DIL works with social enterprises to develop tech solutions for governance, healthcare, and education. We provide technical support, funding, and market linkages.

projects.title: Civic Tech Initiative
projects.description: Developing digital solutions for local governance

name: Rural Health Outreach Trust
mission: Reducing rural health disparities through mobile clinics and public health awareness.
description: RHOT operates in tribal districts of Jharkhand, offering preventive healthcare, vaccination drives, and maternal health programs.

projects.title: Maternal Health Initiative
projects.description: Supported 3000+ women with prenatal and postnatal care

name: SkillUp Youth Foundation
mission: Improving employability of rural youth through career training and industry partnerships.
description: SkillUp runs training centers in Haryana, offering job-oriented courses in IT, retail, and logistics.

projects.title: Rural Employment Program
projects.description: Placed 1500+ youth in private sector roles

name: Smart Village Innovation Trust
mission: Digitizing governance and improving rural service delivery through tech solutions.
description: SVIT builds digital kiosks, e-governance access points, and citizen service centers in remote blocks of Odisha.

projects.title: E-Governance Kiosk Project
projects.description: Set up 120+ citizen service kiosks across districts

projects.title: Digital Literacy for Farmers
projects.description: Trained 4000 farmers to use digital services

name: Nature Conservation Forum
mission: Protecting biodiversity and empowering indigenous communities for environmental stewardship.
description: NCF operates conservation programs in Assamâ€™s forest belts, focusing on anti-poaching education and habitat restoration.

projects.title: Habitat Restoration Program
projects.description: Restored 1200 hectares of degraded forest land

name: India Tech for Good Alliance
mission: Accelerating the use of technology to improve education and public services.
description: ITGA funds and supports ed-tech and civic-tech startups, providing grants, mentorship, and research support.

projects.title: Digital Civics Research Program
projects.description: Published 12+ research papers on tech-based governance

name: Community Resilience Network
mission: Building disaster-resilient communities in hilly regions through capacity development.
description: CRN strengthens disaster preparedness by training communities for landslides, floods, and emergency response.

name: Women Tech Forward
mission: Increasing women's participation in the technology workforce.
description: The foundation sponsors tech scholarships, coding programs, and mentorship networks for women across India.

name: Bharat Rural Development Center
mission: Improving rural income and empowering Panchayats through decentralised development.
description: BRDC works with Panchayats to improve local governance, run livelihood clusters, and support SHGs in MP.

name: Future Cities Innovation Lab
mission: Driving innovation for sustainable and smart urban development.
description: FCIL incubates cleantech, mobility, and urban governance startups focused on solving Indian city challenges.

projects.title: Urban Innovation Accelerator
projects.description: Supported 25+ startups in mobility, waste, and energy

projects.title: Smart City Data Lab
projects.description: Built open datasets for 4 Indian cities

name: Mindful Education Collective
mission: Enhancing student well-being through mental health programs in schools.
description: MEC provides school counselors, SEL curriculum, and teacher training on mental health across Kerala.

name: Himalayan Education Support Trust
mission: Improving access to schooling in remote mountain regions.
description: Operates learning centers and provides volunteer teachers in remote Himachal villages.

name: Clean Air Action Network
mission: Reducing air pollution through awareness, data tracking, and policy advocacy.
description: Runs air-quality monitoring stations and community sensitization programs across NCR.

name: Digital Rural Access Mission
mission: Bridging the rural digital divide through connectivity and training.
description: Provides Wi-Fi hotspots, digital kiosks, and basic digital literacy in rural Telangana.

name: Sustainable Agriculture Collective
mission: Promoting chemical-free agriculture and small farmer sustainability.
description: Works with farmer groups to reduce stubble burning and adopt natural farming.

name: Urban Women Workforce Fund
mission: Increasing women's workforce participation in urban India.
description: Supports skilling, placement, and workplace safety advocacy for low-income women.

name: Green Villages Restoration Trust
mission: Reviving forest ecosystems with community partnership.
description: Works with tribal communities on reforestation, water conservation, and forest-based livelihoods.

name: TechBridge Incubation Hub
mission: Supporting deep-tech startups solving social and industrial problems.
description: Runs structured incubation programs with prototyping labs and investor access.

name: India Water Security Mission
mission: Ensuring village-level water security through sustainable interventions.
description: Builds rainwater harvesting systems, restores ponds, and trains village committees.

name: Youth Employability Accelerator
mission: Preparing youth for the future job market through practical training.
description: Runs domain-based certifications and soft-skills workshops in tier-2 cities.

name: India Governance Research Forum
mission: Improving public service delivery through research and policy pilots.
description: Works with state governments on education, health, and municipal governance reforms.

name: Rural Transport Access Coalition
mission: Improving rural connectivity and access to basic services.
description: Works with panchayats to upgrade village roads and provide shared transport solutions.

projects.title: Village Mobility Pilot
projects.description: Launched shared EV rickshaws in 12 villages

name: Women Health Literacy Forum
mission: Building awareness on maternal and menstrual health.
description: Operates health literacy workshops and partners with ASHA workers for community outreach.

name: Tech for Schools Initiative
mission: Boosting digital education through accessible tools and teacher training.
description: Provides low-cost tablets, digital content, and teacher support for government schools.

name: Community Nutrition Improvement Trust
mission: Reducing malnutrition through community-driven nutrition programs.
description: Runs nutrition camps and partners with anganwadis for child growth monitoring.

name: Indian Youth Climate Forum
mission: Mobilizing youth for climate action and sustainability projects.
description: Conducts climate leadership programs, schools outreach, and community climate pilots.

name: Inclusive Tech Workforce Alliance
mission: Increasing employment opportunities for persons with disabilities.
description: Connects companies with trained candidates, provides accessibility training, and develops assistive tech tools.

projects.description: Enabled 60 organizations to adopt accessibility norms

projects.title: Disability Tech Lab
projects.description: Developed 3 assistive tools for job seekers

name: Rural Microenterprise Accelerator
mission: Supporting rural entrepreneurs through training and market linkages.
description: Helps small artisans, shopkeepers, and women microenterprises grow sustainably.

name: India Mental Health Collective
mission: Improving access to mental health support across India.
description: Runs helplines, tele-counseling, and training for school counselors and youth workers.

mission: Helping small farmers access stable, higher-value markets.
description: Creates farmer groups, trains in post-harvest handling, and connects to wholesale buyers.

mission: Preparing students for future digital careers.
description: Operates coding labs, robotics workshops, and early-tech training in schools and colleges.

name: Indian Community Housing Trust
mission: Supporting safe housing and basic infrastructure for low-income communities.
description: Works with municipalities to upgrade slum housing and support community groups.

name: Tribal Education Advancement Fund
mission: Increasing school attendance and learning outcomes in tribal belts.
description: Provides residential schooling support, scholarships, and remedial education.

name: Clean Rivers Restoration Alliance
mission: Restoring river ecosystems through community participation.
description: Runs river clean-ups, pollution monitoring, and watershed restoration.

name: Women Legal Empowerment Network
mission: Providing legal literacy and support services to women.
description: Runs legal aid clinics, support groups, and case-navigation services in semi-urban areas.

name: India Renewable Energy Lab
mission: Accelerating clean-energy startups working on solar, wind, and bioenergy.
description: Provides testing labs, prototyping tools, and investor networks for energy innovators.

name: Rural Water Governance Support Center
mission: Improving village water governance through committees and data-based planning.
description: Trains gram panchayats on water budgeting, monitoring, and village planning.

name: Future of Learning Innovation Fund
mission: Supporting innovation in teaching, assessments, and learning tools.
description: Funds pilots in government schools and early-stage edtech startups.

name: India Public Health Research Collective
mission: Strengthening public health systems with research and field pilots.
description: Works with state governments on disease surveillance, data systems, and health worker training.

name: Community Digital Services Alliance
mission: Expanding digital public services in rural communities.
description: Runs digital seva centers and trains volunteers for assisted digital transactions.
